m_szDocTitle: Morgan Stanley hikes Tesla stock price target on driverless car potential - Business - CBC News
m_szDocSumamry: Morgan Stanley hikes Tesla stock price target on driverless car potential Company could unveil some sort of ride-sharing plans using driverless cars within a year, Adam Jonas says CBC News Posted: Aug 17, 2015 12:39 PM ET Last Updated: Aug 17, 2015 2:52 PM ET Morgan Stanley hiked its target price for Tesla because it thinks the electric car company is close to unveiling a self-driving ride-sharing service. (Robert Galbraith/Reuters) Related Stories Tesla Motors inks deal to build 400 charging stations in China An analyst with Morgan Stanley says the stock price of electric car maker Tesla coul
